Class NBodySimulation

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.physics.classical.mechanics.NBodySimulation
public class NBodySimulation extends Object
Direct N-body gravitational simulation (O(nÂ²)).

Use BarnesHutSimulation for O(n log n) with many particles.

Modernized to JScience. * @author Silvere Martin-Michiellot
Since:
1.0
Author:
Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
